Generation VII.Sun: When this Pokémon becomes angry, its pores secrete a poisonous sweat, which it sprays at its opponent's eyes.

Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It lurks in the dark of night looking for prey. At the moment it pounces, the rings on its body glow dimly but ominously.
